professional_summary: Experienced Oracle Database Administrator with expertise in database management, backup and recovery strategies, performance tuning, and 24/7 production support.

key_responsibilities: Implementation and management of Oracle databases across multiple environments.
Design and execution of backup and recovery strategies to ensure data integrity.
Performance tuning and optimization of database queries and applications.
Implementation of backup and recovery strategies using RMAN.
Database cloning and migration using RMAN and Data Pump utilities.
Implementation of recovery strategies and database restoration during crashes.
Performance monitoring and tuning for ensuring optimal database performance.
Monitoring physical I/O and proper sizing of rollback segments.

education.degree: B.S. in Information Systems and Cyber Security
